title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Sunday, August 13 (game #566)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: Stalker 2's release date may have been leaked
description: Distributor Plaion has the shooter listed as releasing on December 1, whilst other games have a December 31 placeholder date.

title: Hamilton Simulator is real, and it's available to play right now on Roblox
description: Play interactive puzzles and history-themed activities - all set to the music of Hamilton - right now in Roblox.

title: Google Pixel 8 video leak reveals a new blue color and Audio Magic Eraser
description: A new promotional video for the Google Pixel 8 and Pixel 8 Pro has leaked out, and here's what it shows.

title: Apple could be refreshing the iPhone 14 with a USB-C port
description: Code found hidden in tvOS 17 suggests that older handsets might be getting the USB-C treatment too.

title: I thought a Raspberry Pi NAS was a good idea - here’s why I'm wrong
description: “How hard can it be?”, I asked, painfully unaware of the consequences to come.

title: Windows 11 no longer has Cortana as Microsoft pulls the plug on digital assistant
description: After saying that Cortana would be scrapped in August, Microsoft is now following through on that promise.

title: One of the most worrying WordPress malware threats is making a comeback
description: Balada Injector is back, compromising WordPress websites across the internet with malicious code.

title: ICYMI: the week's biggest tech news, from iPhone launch date to Disney price hikes
description: If you missed the week's biggest tech news, fear not – we've picked out all the best stories from the past seven days so you can catch up at your leisure.
